__e: We'll wipe the Italians away and take the next step on Sunday!
He isn't even Italian, and you put his life at stake.
He's a goddamn Italian and I want you to spill his blood.
The Italians are a great people, but they committed a fatal error... they chose the wrong side.
I shall tell him... that they are Italian...
Do you know where they put the Italians?
